attributes.action: More support for parents with special educational needs children
attributes.background: Help fund and establish further support

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want there to be more support for parents with children with special educational needs (SEN), but we're not sure what additional support you want to be provided.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund additional specialist school capacity for children with disabilities & SEN: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600677

Fund increased support for children with additional needs in mainstream schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606406
